about.name: Karl-Johan Westhoff
about.summary: 15+ yeas of experience in designing and building structures for the Ocean, hereunder making the software tools for doing the engineering. I have extensive experience with managing client facing and technically challenging projects of various size.

company.name: National Oilwell Varco (NOV)
company.description: NOV delivers highly engineered flexible pipe systems for the biggest companies in the offshore oil and gas industry

workexperience.title: Senior Engineer, software development (Remote)
tasks: Working remote, developing in house web based project management tool.

workexperience.title: Senior Engineer, System Assessment Services
tasks: Project management responsibility for large front end engineering design (FEED) projects ( ~1000-3500 engineering hrs. up to 250.000$) bringing new technology to market and pushing boundaries for flexible risers.
System assessment engineer and project manager responsible for the technical and commercial execution of client facing service projects in the offshore oil and gas industry.
Planning and execution of off-site technical forensics campaign in the Caucasus area, including handling import/export of materials and personnel, and strategy for health and safety (HSE).

Engineering during sales phase and tactical on-site management for a engineering procurement construction and installation (EPCI) project delivering a ship to shore on/off loading system in West Africa.

workexperience.title: Senior Engineer, Pipe System Design
tasks: Design engineer, designing flexible pipe and riser systems
Deliver design reports and documentation on time
Handle client communication on technical engineering subjects
Build software skills developing a multitude of engineering design tools.

workexperience.title: Design Engineer, Pipe Design
tasks: Design flexible pipes for the toughest offshore conditions, worldwide
Participate in technical meetings with clients

company.name: Lloyds Register / Odegaard & Danneskiold-Samsoe
company.description: Odegaard & Danneskold-Sams√∏e (ODS) carried out Engineering consultancy within fluid dynamics, noise and vibration. ODS was acquired by Lloyds Register in 2005

workexperience.title: Consultant, Marine
tasks: Finite Element (FEA) calculations of strength and vibration of ships
Field measurement work, acoustics and structural vibration

workexperience.title: Student Assistant
tasks: Continuing an internship I worked in the ship design department, carrying out 3d-modelling and cad workshop drawings.

education.title: M.Sc. Mechanical Engineering
education.description: Thesis work at DTU, Blast Performance of CFRP Composites: The project was carried out in cooperation with the Danish Defence Research Establishment (now a part of (FMT) and Falck-Schmidt Defence System. The project dealt with carbon fiber composite materials subjected to high explosives and included numerical modelling and design of and execution of blast experiments.

education.title: B.Sc Naval Architecture and Marine Engineering

items.title: Oil and Gas Industry
items.description: 10+ yas in the flexible pipe industry making big and awesome stuctures, adhering to the second-to-noon requirements and standards for safety in oil & gas industry. I have workted with submerged structured, both in the watercolumn and on seabed

items.description: Calculating strains and stresses of floating structures subjected to wave loads, and producing engineerig designs adhering to class standards

items.title: Project Planning
items.description: I am used to the rigorous planning, constant updates and constant cooridination required to succede in the huge infrastructure projects of the Oil and Gas industry, including agile short term task planning using PDCA lean boards etc. to full fledged gantt charted projects which are to interface with the largest infrastructure projects in the world.

items.title: Risk Analyses
items.description: Risk analyses is a part of everthiong in the Oil and Gas industry both regarding financial risks and the risk for life. I am used to adhering  to the stringest requirements and carrying out risl managament of all layers including everything from strategic risk analyses/planning over HIRA's to Toolbox talks in fhe field. I like the oil and gas indu stry for this particular reason -alwaus think sakfety, it is ypur loved ones who will suffer if you are injured
